Armor_Brew.NAME: Armor Brew
Armor_Brew.DESCRIPTION: Draw !MISC! card. Brew a Block Potion in !M! turns.
Armor_Brew.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !MISC! cards. Brew a Block Potion in !M! turns.

Energy_Shield.NAME: Energy Shield
Energy_Shield.DESCRIPTION: Gain X Block. NL Gain X [E].
Energy_Shield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain X + !B! Block. NL Gain X [E].

Explosive_Brew.NAME: Explosive Brew
Explosive_Brew.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Brew an Explosive Potion in !M! turns.

Fire_Brew.NAME: Fire Brew
Fire_Brew.DESCRIPTION: Brew a Fire Potion in NL !M! - X turns. NL Exhaust.

Fly.NAME: Fly
Fly.DESCRIPTION: Air: Gain !B! Block. Otherwise, gain !M! Flight. NL Exhaust.

On_The_Head.NAME: On The Head
On_The_Head.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Air: Draw !M! card and gain [E].

Pincer_Repair.NAME: Pincer Repair
Pincer_Repair.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. The enemy gains !M! Artifact.

Quackster.NAME: Quackster
Quackster.DESCRIPTION: Brew a random Potion in !M! turns.

Swoop_Down.NAME: Swoop Down
Swoop_Down.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage per Flight you have.
